main_definition: Exceeding normal or reasonable limits; going beyond what is necessary, appropriate, or allowed.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Beyond the usual or appropriate amount
meanings_and_examples.example: She applied excessive makeup for her wedding day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unreasonably large in size, quantity, or intensity
meanings_and_examples.example: He was taking an excessively high dosage of painkillers.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Going too far in one's actions or behavior
meanings_and_examples.example: His anger towards his boss had become excessive, leading him to storm out of the office.

meanings_and_examples.definition: More than what is considered normal or necessary
meanings_and_examples.example: Their consumption of sugar was excessive compared to other families' habits.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Abnormally high in quantity, degree, or size; more than ordinarily
meanings_and_examples.example: During the heatwave, they were drinking water in excessive amounts to stay hydrated.
